caster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
caster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

caster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
caster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
caster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

caster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
caster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

caster:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
caster:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !caster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

caster:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
caster:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !caster:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
